name: Visual Stimulation
description:
You play as a young male who, alongside a friend, gets into an accident which takes away most of your memories. The two of you awaken in a strange hospital in a town you don't know much about, and you're left with only one other companion, in the form of a digital assistant. Will you be able to regain your memories?

This story is meant for an audience that is at least 18 years old. This is a gay dating sim and the story will contain romantic and sexual interactions between yourself and one of five male dateable characters.

If you like what you see, and want to help me to get art done for the story, you can donate to me here.

If you have any comments, suggestions or corrections, you can e-mail me here.
